response.overview: "Undesired Wished" 3d animated short film. Theme -Social Message. Nowadays due to increasing consumption and comparison, most people are victims of stress and anxiety. To overcome this they take help from mobile. This story is of a 10 year old little girl. Who wants attention from her mother and father. But her parents have given her attention to the mobile phone. When in school her teacher asks all the children to draw their wishes on paper, then this girl draws her wish. In which she shows that she wants to make a mobile phone, only then her parents will give her their attention.
response.title: Undesired Wish
